001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.decorators.DecoratorsFactory;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.parameters.DataForge;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.Quest;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.SuperQuest;
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Optional;
010import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
011import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
012import org.springframework.test.context.junit.jupiter.SpringExtension;
013
014import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StorageKeysTest.ARGUMENTS;
015import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StoreKeys.QUEST;
016
017/**
018 * Manages the test execution context, providing utilities for storing and retrieving test-related data.
019 *
020 * <p>This class handles:
021 * <ul>
022 *     <li>Retrieving and decorating the test quest context.</li>
023 *     <li>Storing test method arguments for later reference.</li>
024 *     <li>Tracking the number of parameters in test methods.</li>
025 * </ul>
026 *
027 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
028 */
029public class TestContextManager {
030
031   private TestContextManager() {
032   }
033
034   /**
035    * Key used for tracking the total number of parameters in a test method.
036    */
037   private static final String TOTAL_PARAMS_KEY = "totalParams";
038
039   /**
040    * Retrieves the {@link SuperQuest} associated with the given test execution context.
041    *
042    * <p>This method extracts the {@link Quest} object from the global extension context store,
043    * then decorates it using the {@link DecoratorsFactory} to return an instance of {@link SuperQuest}.
044    *
045    * @param extensionContext the JUnit extension context
046    * @return a {@link SuperQuest} instance containing decorated quest data
047    * @throws IllegalStateException if no {@link Quest} is found in the global store
048    */
049   public static SuperQuest getSuperQuest(ExtensionContext extensionContext) {
050      Quest quest = Optional.ofNullable((Quest) extensionContext.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL).get(QUEST))
051            .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalStateException("Quest not found in the global store."));
052
053      ApplicationContext appCtx = SpringExtension.getApplicationContext(extensionContext);
054      DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory = appCtx.getBean(DecoratorsFactory.class);
055
056      return decoratorsFactory.decorate(quest, SuperQuest.class);
057   }
058
059   /**
060    * Stores a test argument in both the {@link SuperQuest} storage and the global JUnit extension context.
061    *
062    * <p>This method ensures that test arguments are persistently stored and can be retrieved later if needed.
063    * The arguments are categorized using the {@link DataForge} enumeration.
064    *
065    * @param superQuest       the current {@link SuperQuest} instance managing test data
066    * @param dataForge        an enum representing the type of argument
067    * @param argument         the argument object to be stored
068    * @param extensionContext the JUnit extension context
069    */
070   public static void storeArgument(SuperQuest superQuest, DataForge<?> dataForge,
071                                    Object argument, ExtensionContext extensionContext) {
072      superQuest.getStorage().sub(ARGUMENTS).put(dataForge.enumImpl(), argument);
073
074      ExtensionContext.Store store = extensionContext.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL);
075      List<Object> args = Optional.ofNullable((List<Object>) store.get(ARGUMENTS)).orElseGet(ArrayList::new);
076      args.add(argument);
077      store.put(ARGUMENTS, args);
078   }
079
080   /**
081    * Initializes parameter tracking for a test method.
082    *
083    * <p>This method stores the total number of parameters of the test method in the extension context.
084    * The stored value can be used for validation or further processing within the test lifecycle.
085    *
086    * @param extensionContext the JUnit extension context
087    */
088   public static void initializeParameterTracking(ExtensionContext extensionContext) {
089      extensionContext.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace
090                  .create(TestContextManager.class, extensionContext.getUniqueId()))
091            .computeIfAbsent(TOTAL_PARAMS_KEY,
092                  key -> extensionContext.getRequiredTestMethod().getParameters().length);
093   }
094
095}
